ask_information.what_are_your_opening_hours: We are open from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday to Friday.
ask_information.where_are_you_located: We are located in downtown Paris, close to the main station.

book_meeting.how_to_book_an_appointment: You can book an appointment by providing your preferred date and time.
book_meeting.can_i_schedule_a_meeting: Sure! Tell me your preferred date and time.

cancel.what_is_the_cancel_policy: Appointments can be cancelled up to 24 hours in advance without any charge.
